title: Obtain the Sinner
text: M...B...CC... is that right? I've heard of your place! There are a lot of Sinners there. Enough chitchat, let me in!

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: Ah... strength is like collecting garbage. The more you collect, the stronger you become.

title: Level Start
text: I bet I can find a lot of treasures on this trip.

title: Win Battles
text: What's that thing called... from the book... oh rights! Hardness triumphs over softness, strength over feebleness!

title: Die in Battles
text: You are not allowed to go there...

title: Greeting
text: Where are we going today to scavenge... no, I mean, to catch Sinners?

title: Conversation 1
text: The people from the procurement office always spend money like crazy. I'll have to give them a talking to. Money doesn't grow on tress, you know.

title: Conversation 2
text: Want to come play DisChess? They're not here, so let's just play with the two of us. Chief, don't go! Try it out! It's fun!

title: Conversation 3
text: "Don't treat others' gossip as gifts, because you're not a garbage collector." Huh? Is this line in the book making fun of me, Chief? No? Good, I'll write it down then.

title: Idle
text: When can we go to the Rust together again? There's a new shipment over there. I hear there are some light track construction materials. If we scavenge some, we can make a fortune!

title: Annoyed
text: Oh yeah! Right there! Harder! Wow... feels so good...

title: Special Attention
text: Huh? I'm the only one left standing here? No! That's so boring!

title: Dispatch
text: Chief, the weather is so nice today! Won't you come along?

title: Dispatch Complete
text: Harvest time! I can't fit everything in my cart!
